allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Enhanced TUI with full converter functionality

- Add tabbed interface with Converter and Sessions tabs
- Add mode selection \(All Projects, Directory, Single File\)
- Add project checkboxes with Select All/Deselect All
- Add date filtering \(from-date, to-date\) inputs
- Add output directory input
- Add options switches \(open browser, skip sessions, clear cache\)
- Add Convert button with progress bar and status log
- Filter GitHub URL and build messages from npm cli output
- Bump version to 0.9.0
EOF
\)")
